meanings.definition: Unknown quantities in a mathematical equation.
meanings.sent1: The algebra student struggled with solving for the incognitas in the equation.
meanings.sent2: The teacher explained how to find the incognitas in the math problem.
meanings.sent3: The incognitas in the equation were like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent4: The incognitas were the missing puzzle pieces that needed to be found to solve the problem.
meanings.sent5: The concept of incognitas made the math equation more challenging yet exciting to solve.

meanings.definition: Things that are not yet understood or known.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are constantly researching to uncover the incognitas of the universe.
meanings.sent2: The mystery novel kept the readers intrigued with its hidden incognitas.
meanings.sent3: The incognitas of the situation added an element of suspense to the story.
meanings.sent4: The incognitas of the case were slowly revealed as the detective investigated further.
meanings.sent5: The explorer faced many incognitas as he ventured into the uncharted territory.
